title: Apsara: Ayurvedic Skin & Hair Care Products
author: Sharm
description: Shop Apsara Skin Care's beauty, skin & hair care products made with time-tested Ayurvedic ingredients known for their high performance & powerful effects. Apsara brings ancient wisdom into modern skin care.
cleaned_text: The new version is much thicker and does not seem to sink into the skin as the previous one. Absolutely love Vitamin C serum. Started using it few days back & already see the results. My face Is loosing the dullness slowly. Thanks. Apsara's Age Defense Skin Care Routine We lovedddd it! will buy again :-) This is the best face care routine My daughter went to college and was missing the routine so sent it across to her and she is loving it
